root.name: Mainichi Issho
root.description: Mainichi Issho was a PlayStation Network game in Japan that ran from November 11, 2006 to November 11th, 2009. It was replaced by the PSN game Weekly Toro Station.Mainichi Issho (Everyday Together) starred the characters Toro Inoue and Kuro as they discussed video game news and other subjects in a news report style mode, as well as other modes including shopping for in game items, communicating with other users, and watching Toro and company interact in a virtual environment.
